objects.name: Tank
objects.source_note: Death Mode is a PvP mode where each player controls a Tank

objects.name: Spawn Point
objects.source_note: Each player spawns randomly at one of six spawn points, avoiding obstacles

objects.name: Chest
objects.special_rules: Spawns every 15 seconds, not in the last 15s of the match
objects.source_note: Gold chests spawn randomly within the Safe Zone

objects.name: Obstacle
objects.description: Various map obstacles affecting movement and gameplay
objects.special_rules: Includes water (blocks movement but not bullets), mud (reduces speed by 10%), destructible objects
objects.source_note: Map contains various obstacles like water, mud pits, destructible objects

systems.name: Matchmaking System
systems.description: System for organizing players into matches
systems.mechanics: Solo Free-for-All matchmaking for 6 players per match
systems.source_note: Matchmaking system uses rules defined in [Multiplayer Module] [Tank War] Matchmaking System Design

systems.name: Spawn & Respawn System
systems.description: Manages player spawning and respawning mechanics
systems.mechanics: Initial random spawn at one of six points, 3-second respawn timer, 2-second invincibility shield
systems.objectives: Ensure fair starting positions and provide temporary protection after respawning
systems.source_note: Players spawn randomly avoiding obstacles, with 3s respawn time and 2s invincibility

systems.name: In-Match Upgrade System
systems.description: System for upgrading tank stats during matches
systems.mechanics: Uses Gold to upgrade stats with increasing costs based on BaseCost, WIstat, and StepGrowthstat(k)
systems.objectives: Provide progression and strategic decision-making during matches
systems.source_note: Upgrade costs follow formula γ_OSt_stat(k) = BaseCost × WI_stat × StepGrowth_stat(k)

systems.name: Ranking System
systems.description: Determines player rankings at the end of matches
systems.mechanics: Prioritizes Kill count, then Death count, then Damage Dealt
systems.objectives: Establish clear winner determination and ranking criteria
systems.source_note: Ranking determined by Kills > Deaths > Damage Dealt

systems.name: Gold Distribution System
systems.mechanics: Gold from kills (80 per kill) and random chest spawns
systems.objectives: Provide resources for upgrades and maintain game balance
systems.source_note: Gold sources include 80 per kill and random chest spawns

logic_rules.description: Players receive temporary invincibility after respawning
logic_rules.source_note: After respawning, players have 2s invincibility shield

logic_rules.description: Determines total gold spawned at any given time
logic_rules.effect: Sum of all chest values at time t

logic_rules.description: Defines the cost of upgrading tank stats
logic_rules.effect: Calculated using BaseCost, WIstat, and StepGrowthstat(k)
logic_rules.source_note: Upgrade cost follows γ_OSt_stat(k) = BaseCost × WI_stat × StepGrowth_stat(k)

logic_rules.description: Determines ranking when players have equal Kill counts
logic_rules.source_note: Tie-breaking uses Kills > Deaths > Damage Dealt

requirements.title: Competitive Ranking System
requirements.description: Implement a clear ranking system based on performance metrics
requirements.acceptance_criteria: Rankings must be determined by Kills > Deaths > Damage Dealt without ties
requirements.source_note: Ranking system must resolve ties using multiple criteria

requirements.title: Balanced Gold Economy
requirements.description: Ensure fair distribution of in-match gold
requirements.acceptance_criteria: Gold must come from kills (80 per kill) and randomized chest spawns
requirements.source_note: Gold economy includes fixed kill rewards and variable chest values

requirements.title: Progressive Upgrade Costs
requirements.description: Implement escalating costs for stat upgrades
requirements.acceptance_criteria: Upgrade costs must increase based on BaseCost, WIstat, and StepGrowthstat(k)
requirements.source_note: Upgrade costs must grow exponentially to prevent overpowered builds

requirements.title: Fair Spawn System
requirements.description: Ensure players spawn in fair and random locations
requirements.acceptance_criteria: Spawn points must avoid obstacles and be randomized
requirements.source_note: Spawn system must place players randomly while avoiding obstacles
